snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 424: Sonic Ultimate: New Beginnings (SAGE2004)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic Ultimate: New Beginnings - Demo (SAGE2004)
Credit: ShadowTeam (CyberBlade)
Release Date: March 14th, 2004

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Boot&Title
00:38 - Mountain Hill Zone Act 1
05:49 - Mountain Hill Zone Act 2
10:17 - Boss 1
12:25 - Lava Palace Zone Act 1
16:37 - Lava Palace Zone Act 2
21:06 - Boss 2
23:36 - Kaleidascope Carnival Zone Act 1
26:26 - End Screen
26:43 - Special Stage

NOTES: And now we return the ye old Shadow Team from the old days.
And marvel at this visually decent and or nice looking game.
Where Eggman has built the Apocalypse Egg!
A massive Death Egg construction housing all of his weapons ever made!
HOW will Sonic STOP IT!?
Well sadly we will never fully know...
But what we do know is again this visually looks great for the most part.
Sounds fine too.
BUT... The physics in this game are very rough, Sonic is extremely slippery like on ice.
Jumping off of slopes is clunky if not impossible almost, wall jumps somewhat work.
The music may not loop upon death and things really get wacky when you get hurt by something.
Otherwise past these very notable issues it's not all that bad.

(ISSUES)

1. In Lava Palace Act 2 it's possible to break out of bounds.
2. Boss 2 still keeps attacking once it is defeated.
